Protocols/MGLAnnotationControllerDelegat.name: -annotationController:didSelectStyleAnnotation:
Protocols/MGLAnnotationControllerDelegat.abstract: Called after the user has tapped and selected a style annotation.

Protocols/MGLAnnotationControllerDelegat.name: -annotationController:didDeselectStyleAnnotation:
Protocols/MGLAnnotationControllerDelegat.abstract: Called after the user has tapped and deselected a style annotation.

Protocols/MGLAnnotationControllerDelegat.abstract: The MGLAnnotationControllerDelegate protocol defines a set of optional methods that you

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: -initWithCoordinate:
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: Returns a new symbol style annotation anchored at a specified coordinate.

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: -initWithCoordinate:text:color:
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: Returns a new symbol style annotation anchored at a specified coordinate with a defined text color.

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: Returns a new symbol style annotation anchored at a specified coordinate with a defined icon image.

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: iconImageName
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The name of the image within an MGLMapStyle‘s sprite

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: iconColor
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The color to render the icon image of the symbol style annotation. Requires iconImageName.

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: iconAnchor
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The placement of the symbol style annotation’s icon image relative to its anchor,

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: iconOffset
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The offset distance of the symbol style annotation’s icon image from its anchor.

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: iconOpacity
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The opacity of the symbol style annotation’s icon image. Requires iconImageName. Defaults to 1.

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: iconRotation
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The counterclockwise rotation angle of the symbol style annotation’s icon image, measured in degrees.

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: iconScale
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The value of which to multiply the size of the original symbol style annotation icon size,

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: iconHaloWidth
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: An optional value representing the size of the halo or outline around a symbol annotation’s icon image,

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: iconHaloBlur
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: An optional value representing the fade out size of the halo or outline around a symbol annotation’s icon image,

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: iconHaloColor
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: An optional value representing the color of the halo or outline around a symbol annotation’s icon image.

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: fontNames
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: An optional array of font face names used to display the text of the symbol style annotation. Requires text.

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: text
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The text to display for a symbol style annotation. Defaults to "".

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: textColor
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The color of the text used by the symbol style annotation. Requires text. Defaults to black.

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: textFontSize
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The font size of the text used by the symbol style annotation, measured in screen points.

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: textOpacity
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The opacity of the text used by the symbol style annotation, represented as a range of values

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: textTransform
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The type of text transformation that should be used by the text of the symbol style annotation,

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: textJustification
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The text justification or alignment of the symbol style annotation’s text, as

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The placement of the symbol style annotation’s text relative to its anchor, as specified

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: textLetterSpacing
Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The tracking amount of the symbol style annotation’s text, measured in ems.

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: textRotation

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The radial offset of the text belonging to a symbol style annotation in the direction of the

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: An optional value representing the fade out size of the halo or outline around a symbol style

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: An optional value representing the color of the halo or outline around a symbol style

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: An optional value representing the size of the halo or outline around a symbol style

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The maximum line width before text wraps to a new line, measured in ems.

Classes/MGLSymbolStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: An optional value representing the ascending order at which symbol style annotations should be

Classes/MGLLineStyleAnnotation.html#/c:o.name: lineColor

Classes/MGLLineStyleAnnotation.html#/c:o.name: lineWidth
Classes/MGLLineStyleAnnotation.html#/c:o.abstract: The width of the line style annotation, measured in screen points. Defaults to 1.

Classes/MGLLineStyleAnnotation.html#/c:o.name: lineBlur
Classes/MGLLineStyleAnnotation.html#/c:o.abstract: The blur applied to the line, measured in screen points greater than or equal to zero.

Classes/MGLLineStyleAnnotation.html#/c:o.name: lineOffset
Classes/MGLLineStyleAnnotation.html#/c:o.abstract: The line style annotation’s offset. A positive value offsets the line to the right, relative to

Classes/MGLLineStyleAnnotation.html#/c:o.name: linePattern
Classes/MGLLineStyleAnnotation.html#/c:o.abstract: The name of the image within an MGLMapStyle‘s sprite

Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: -initWithCenter:
Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: Returns a new circle style annotation with a specified center.

Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: center
Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The center of the circle style annotation.

Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: circleRadius
Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The radius of the circle style annotation, measured in screen points. Defaults to 5.

Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: circleColor
Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The fill color of the circle style annotation. Defaults to black.

Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: circleOpacity
Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The opacity of the fill color associated with the circle style annotation, represented as a range

Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: circleStrokeWidth
Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The width of the stroke or outline of the circle style annotation, measured in screen points.

Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: circleStrokeColor
Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The stroke or outline color of the circle style annotation. Defaults to black.

Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: circleStrokeOpacity
Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The opacity of the stroke or outline color of the circle style annotation, represented as a range

Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.name: circleBlur
Classes/MGLCircleStyleAnnotation.html#/c.abstract: The amount to blur the circle style annotation, measured in screen points. Defaults to 0.

Classes/MGLStyleAnnotation.html#/c:objc(.abstract: The universally unique identifier of the style annotation.

Classes/MGLStyleAnnotation.html#/c:objc(.abstract: If provided, the title string displayed if callouts are enabled.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconAllowsOverlap
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: If true, the icon will be visible even if it collides with other previously drawn symbols.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconIgnoresPlacement
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: If true, other symbols can be visible even if they collide with the icon.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconOptional
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: If true, text will display without their corresponding icons only when the icon collides with other

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconPadding
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: The size of the additional area around the icon’s bounding box used for detecting symbol collisions.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconPitchAlignment
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: The orientation of the style annotation’s icon when map is pitched, as defined by MGLIconPitchAlignment.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconRotationAlignment
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: Determines the rotation behavior of icons, in combination with symbolPlacement as defined by MGLIconRotationAlignment.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconTextFit
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: Scales the icon to fit around the associated text, as defined by MGLIconTextFit.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconTextFitPadding
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: The size of the additional area added to dimensions determined by iconTextFit.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: keepsIconUpright
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: If true, the icon may be flipped to prevent it from being rendered upside-down.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: keepsTextUpright
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: If true, the text may be flipped vertically to prevent it from being rendered upside-down.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: maximumTextAngle
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: Maximum angle change between adjacent characters, measured in degrees.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: symbolAvoidsEdges
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: If true, the symbols will not cross tile edges to avoid mutual collisions.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: symbolPlacement
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: The placement of the symbol annotation’s text relative to its geometry, as defined by MGLSymbolPlacement.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: symbolSpacing
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: Distance between two symbol anchors, measured in screen points.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: Controls the order in which overlapping symbol style annotations in the same

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: Text leading value for multi-line text, measured in ems.

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: textOptional
Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: If true, symbol style annotation icons will display without their corresponding text if the text

Classes/MGLSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: The size of the additional area around the text bounding box used for detecting symbol collisions,
